DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
Adds damage to your Affliction and Destruction cards, at varying amounts.
Warlock curses damage or cripple an enemy over time. Replaces existing copies on cast.
Consumed to cast certain warlock spells.
Warlocks may only have one Demon active at a time. Summoning a new Demon will replace the old one.
